alert.note: Alert for Duval; Jim Wells; Live Oak (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 11:16PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Duval, northwestern Jim Wells and southwestern Live Oak Counties through 1145 PM CDT... At 1116 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Annarose, or 18 miles south of George West, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Midway, Annarose, Clegg, Rancho De La Parita and Westdale. This includes the following highways... US Highway 281 between mile markers 644 and 660. US Highway 59 between mile markers 738 and 740. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
